summary: This module contains unit tests for NeMo's encoderâ€‘decoder speech labeling models, verifying that models can be instantiated correctly (including ECAPA and TiTaNet variants) and that pretrained models produce expected logits and embeddings for both single and batched audio inputs.
business_intent: Validate the reliability and correctness of speaker labeling models within the ASR pipeline, ensuring proper model construction and inference behavior for regression testing and quality assurance.
